alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:23AM EST until December 28 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected and brief heavy snowfall rates exceeding an inch per hour possible this evening. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts exceeding 6 inches possible, especially in Luce County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph could lead to blowing snow and reduced visibility. * WHERE...Alger, Luce, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may mix with sleet across western Alger County and southern Schoolcraft County, reducing snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
